General.Name: CT Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: CT REIT is an unincorporated, closed-end real estate investment trust formed to own income-producing commercial properties located primarily in Canada. Its portfolio is comprised of over 370 properties totalling more than 30 million square feet of GLA, consisting primarily of net lease single-tenant retail properties located across Canada. Canadian Tire Corporation, Limited is CT REIT's most significant tenant.
General.Address: 2180 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4P 2V8
